item.title: Use renv
item.description: This is a blog describing how to use package renv to facilate the running of github actions. Open project, remove all the packages will be used. Library renv, run renu::init(). Install necessary packages. Run renv::snapshot(). Push all the files to github, done. Pay attention to curl, it often suffers problems in github actions.

item.title: Create an R package Basic
item.description: This is a blog describing my first experience creating a simple R package on class STAT 585 at ISU. Basic Workflow Create a basic R package in R studio using New Project - New Dictionary - R Package Write functions in R/FuncName.R, including roxygen comments at the beginning of each function. Run devtools::document() to update NAMESPACE and man/FuncName.Rd Run usethis::use_package(“package”,type=“Import”) to update the DESCRIPTION

item.title: About
item.description: My name is Yunhui Qi, 3rd year Ph.D. student, Department of Statistics, Iowa State University. Education Ph.D. in Statistics, Iowa State University, 2019 - Present Co-advised by Dr. Peng Liu, Dr. Yumou Qiu M.S. in Statistics-Data Science, University of Wisconsin â€“ Madison, 2017- 2019 B.S. in Statistics, East China Normal University, 2013- 2018 Research Interests Multivariate analysis; Dimension reduction (PCA, CCA, etc.
